name: klexos (krpovmu)
description:
What is Klexos? A puzzle game with a unique twist on traditional block-matching mechanics. The goal of the game is to clear each level's playfield of blocks by matching the symbols on the blocks. To accomplish this, the player controls a small character who can grab, and throw blocks at the playfield. Level Parts
  1. Score:  Earn plenty of points by knocking off as many blocks as you can.
  2. Time: To complete the level.
  3. Number of blocks to leave in the pile before timer reaches zero.
  4. Current number of the blocks remaining on the pile.
  5. Current Level.
  6. Number of the SPECIAL blocks remaining.
How to play?
  • Take aim at your pile of blocks by moving up and down of the ladder with up and down keys.
  • Press the “z” key to throw your block across the screen.
  • You can throw your blocks across the screen or bounce them off the ceiling, there will be an arrow indicating the place where the block will end.
  • You can only hit blocks that are the same as the one you are throwing, You can destroy several pieces that are in a row of the same figure, this will give an extra score for the number of blocks that are destroyed.
  • Your block will bounce back if the first block you hit isn’t the same as the one you are throwing.
When the game ends?
  • The time reaches zero and you haven’t achieved the goal.
  • You can’t make a move.
Special Blocks (Power Ups) An Special Block has one of these symbols:
  • Yellow: It can be used instead of any other block, the probability of it appearing is 60%.
  • Red: Destroy all the blocks of the same symbol at which it is thrown, the probability of it appearing is 35%.
  • Black: Destroy all the blocks on the board the probability is 5%.
